means: （戏剧、音乐、文娱表演等的）演出主持人
善于引起公众注意的人物

sentence.Network_en: He was a typical showman with a brashness bordering on arrogance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个典型的好炫耀者，有一种近乎傲慢的自负。

sentence.Network_en: He was a showman, an extrovert who revelled in controversy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个爱出风头、性格外向而且喜欢争论的人。

sentence.Network_en: He was a master showman, and he knew human nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有表演的人格, 他懂得人情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高一英语词汇表 ... narrator n. 讲述者；口述者 showman n. 演出主持人（如歌舞喜剧、流行音乐会等） in order 按顺序；整齐.
showily 华丽showman 马戏团老板showmanship 技巧

list.abs: his product launches , at which he would stand alone on a black stage and conjure up a " magical " or " incredible " new electronic gadget in front of an awed crowd , were the performances of a master showman .每一次产品推演都是大师杰作，他只身站在黑的台上，召唤出最新电子产品，无不“魔力无穷”或者“
This made the showman feel very uncomfortable ., 这使得团主觉得非常不舒服,
Jackson was the supreme showman who had an unrivalled knack of grabbing headlines ., 杰克逊是谁最高表演了一个无与伦比的诀窍抓住头条新闻.
After the show the showman began to make dinner ., 节目表演完后 , 团主开始做晚餐.

entry.tran: 主持风格夸张搞笑的人;擅长戏剧性表演的人
entry.def: A showman is a person who is very entertaining and dramatic in the way that they perform, or the way that they present things.

means.word_mean: 1. a sponsor who books and stages public entertainments

auth_sentence.content: By all accounts, Williams was an excellent showman.
auth_sentence.res_content: By all accounts, Williams was an excellent showman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By all accounts, Williams was an excellent showman.

auth_sentence.content: Organising...wonderful events with the chutzpah and verve of a showman.
auth_sentence.res_content: Organising...wonderful events with the chutzpah and verve of a showman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Organising...wonderful events with the chutzpah and verve of a showman.

auth_sentence.content: Showman kids are discouraged from socialising with non-showmen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Showman kids are discouraged from socialising with non-showmen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Showman kids are discouraged from socialising with non-showmen.

Sentence.sentence: His product launches, at which he would stand alone on a black stage and produce as if by magic an "incredible" new electronic gadget （小器具）in front of an amazed crowd, were the performances of a master showman.

means.word_mean: (戏剧、音乐、文娱表演等的)演出主持人,娱乐经理人；善于引起公众注意的人物,爱出风头的人物

sentences.en: He was a master showman, and he knew human nature.
sentences.cn: 他有表演的人格，他懂得人情。
